query:
SELECT 
  cv.id,
  cv.variantKey,
  cv.name,
  cv.isActive,
  cv.weight,
  COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) as total_sessions,
  COUNT(DISTINCT cm.id) as total_messages,
  SUM(CASE WHEN cs.converted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as conversions
FROM chatbot_variants cv
LEFT JOIN chatbot_sessions cs ON cv.id = cs.variantId
LEFT JOIN chatbot_messages cm ON cs.id = cm.sessionId
GROUP BY cv.id, cv.variantKey, cv.name, cv.isActive, cv.weight
ORDER BY cv.id;

  cv.id,
  cv.variantKey,
  cv.name,
  cv.isActive,
  cv.weight,
  COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) as total_sessions,
  COUNT(DISTINCT cm.id) as total_messages,
  SUM(CASE WHEN cs.converted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as conversions
FROM chatbot_variants cv
LEFT JOIN chatbot_sessions cs ON cv.id = cs.variantId
LEFT JOIN chatbot_messages cm ON cs.id = cm.sessionId
GROUP BY cv.id, cv.variantKey, cv.name, cv.isActive, cv.weight
ORDER BY cv.id;
